about_the_game:
Note: All save data from the demo will automatically carry over to the full version of the game!

Super Sketch Bob is a 2D action platformer which gives you the power to draw ladders, bridges and trampolines to overcome challenges and save the day!

The Pencil is Mightier

Draw platforming objects in real-time as you solve puzzles, find hidden secrets, and explore six action-packed worlds to bring peace to the Magic Sketchbook!

A Tale of Two Siblings

You play as Bob. He’s a little doodle guy who lives inside a Sketchbook. One day, Bob finds the Magic Pencil, which allows him to draw anything he can imagine! But Bob’s sister Liz gets jealous of him and tries to take the pencil! What a brat! Instead, she ends up with the Magic Eraser! Liz discovers she can erase holes in the world and use them to get around faster! Upon discovering that this really upsets her big bro, Liz starts erasing more bits of the world! Now, Bob, equipped with his Magic Pencil must stop Liz from erasing the world! But is Liz really just that big of a jerk, or is there some reason behind her actions? Restore the Magic Sketchbook's erased Sketch Zones and Bob will tell the story of he and his sister and you may just learn that not everything is quite so simple...

Secrets of the Sketchbook

Search for secret Sketch Tokens, complete levels without dying and under the object goal to unlock hidden secrets! There are over 50 costumes to unlock and each one has a unique style!

Quick on the Draw!

Compete in Time Trial challenges to unlock even more secrets! Try to get all of the secret Blue Stars and you'll have gone even faster than Bob's best time ever!

Play Your Way with Modifiers!

Super Sketch Bob can be modified to fit any playstyle! You can slow down the game's speed, give yourself infinite health, even turn off spiders! Super Sketch Bob is designed so that anyone can play!

Utilize Cross/Link to unlock special items in other Wayward Thoughts Interactive games!

By completing the Advanced Testing Courses in Frip and Froop's Logical Labyrinth DX, you'll be able to find a special item which can be transferred to Super Sketch Bob! What does it unlock? You'll have to play to find out!
